SEARCH
Package entity

Class Internship

java.lang.Object
entity.Internship
public class Internship extends Object
Represents an internship posting created by a company representative.

Contains identifying UUID, descriptive fields (title/description/level/preferredMajor), availability dates, status ("Pending", "Approved", "Rejected", "Filled"), company and representative info, slot count and visibility flag.

  • Constructor Details

    • Internship

      public Internship(UUID id, String title, String description, String level, String preferredMajor, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, String status, String companyName, String representatives, int numberOfSlots, boolean visibility)
      Construct an Internship instance.
      Parameters:
      id - unique internship UUID
      title - internship title
      description - description text
      level - level string
      preferredMajor - preferred major
      openingDate - opening date
      closingDate - closing date
      status - status string
      companyName - company name
      representatives - representative ids/emails
      numberOfSlots - available slots (invalid input: '<'=10)
      visibility - visible to students when true
